General.Name: Realites
General.Description: Réalités S.A. develops real estate projects in the Great West of France. The company undertakes housing, commercial, and health centers contracts, as well as residential homes services for seniors. It also offers real estate brokerage and financing, rental management, and interior decoration services. It supports companies, elected officials, investors, and individuals in the construction and investment promotion projects. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Saint-Herblain, France.
